metadata.description: Intelligent memory retrieval with tier-aware routing, intent classification, and fallback chains

plugins.name: memory-query
plugins.description: Query past conversations with intelligent tier-aware retrieval. Provides /memory-search (topic search), /memory-recent (recent summaries), /memory-context (expand excerpts). Automatically detects available tiers (Topics, Hybrid, Semantic, Keyword, Agentic) and routes through optimal layers with fallback chains.
